extendedInfo.description: Bank whenever, wherever with First International Bank & Trust Mobile Banking. This convenient app brings the branch to you, allowing you to view your balances and recent transactions, transfer money between accounts, pay bills, and even locate the nearest branch or ATMKeywords: First International Bank & Trust, Banking, Finance, Bill Pay, Loans, Checking, Lending, Bank Services, Online Banking

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Heather Nevland

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work with HTC Rezound. Disappointing since the webpage portal won\'t work on phone either.
reviews.author: Travis Jordan

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: Not sure about others but I have no problems with this app. It does what it says and easier than web site.  No I don\'t work for the bank.
reviews.author: David S

reviews.title: Bad tech
reviews.comment: Works sometimes
reviews.author: Barry Kendrick

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I really like this app to help with my banking. It\'s very user friendly and works well for my needs.
reviews.author: Kristi Brink

reviews.title: Dumb security
reviews.comment: Most of these reviews sound bogus like they paid for people to say something good, its just a simple bank app, but this dumb bank makes you change your password every couple months and locks you out if you miss type it more than three times, dumb security feature for a small town community bank someones isn\'t going to steal all my money from my phone app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy To Use!
reviews.comment: Community banking has never been easier!  More fun to use than Words With Friends!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: So much faster than using browser!

reviews.comment: ...Better than angry birds!

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Works great

reviews.comment: Update the app and make it incompatible with my phone. Classy.

reviews.comment: Easy to use. Very convenient.

reviews.title: compatibility
reviews.comment: not compatable with my device... yall should fix this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Travis
reviews.comment: Glad they got it going.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy, but functional app.
reviews.comment: This app worked really well on my droid x, but doesn\'t let me sign in on my htc droid incredible. And it force closes when I try to open it in my tablet that is running ICS. There are a few bugs, but I really like the app when it is working.
reviews.author: Vanessa C

reviews.title: Beware of Trolls
reviews.comment: Having worked at this bank, I suspect the positive reviews for this app are coming from the Stenehjem trolls trying to get a piece of the golden a** to kiss. In 4.5 years at this place, I never once received a complement from a customer on FIBT\'s online banking, only COMPLAINTS. Go for Gate City or Bell, MUCH BETTER apps and banks all around.
reviews.author: J Jangsterish

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: No landscape mode and was slow to update to android 4.1 are my criticisms. It is simple, nothing flashy, it works and is easier to use than the actual website are my praises.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is awesome
reviews.comment: Banking at my fingertips?As if I wasn\'t addicted to my phone enough.

reviews.comment: 2 it rocks. St. Francis de Assisi - \"For it is in giving that we receive.\"
